title: Convert Object to Pairs
description: In this lab, we will be exploring how to create an array of key-value pairs from an object using JavaScript. We will be using the Object.entries() method to extract the keys and values of the object and return them as an array of pairs. This skill is useful when working with APIs or databases that return data in object format.

meta.title: JavaScript | Object to Key-Value Pairs Conversion
meta.description: Learn how to convert an object into an array of key-value pairs using JavaScript's Object.entries() method. Useful for working with APIs and databases.
meta.keywords: JavaScript, object, key-value pairs, Object.entries, programming, tutorial

verify.name: Verify Node Commands History
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.

i18n.title: 将对象转换为键值对
